dcterms:description: Pascal VOC consists of 20 'thing' and 1 'stuff' categories. It contains 10,582 images for model training and 1,449 validation images for evaluation.

dcterms:description: COCO has 80 'thing' and 53 'stuff' categories, which is a challenging benchmark. The models are trained on train2017 (115K images), and evaluated on val2017 (5K images).
